name: Reload!
text:
**Choose one â€”**
- Perform the primary action of your rightmost resolved card.
- Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

name: Backup
text: Perform the primary action of your rightmost resolved card. If you perform an Attack action this way, you cannot target minions.

name: Bounce
text: Move 2 spaces in a straight line, ignoring obstacles; if this card is already resolved as you perform this action, may repeat once.

name: Bullet Time
text:
After you resolve a basic card, you may perform the primary action on that card;
you cannot target the same enemy hero twice in the same turn this way.

name: Steam Jump
text: Place yourself into a space in a straight line in radius. Push an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 1 space.

name: Snipe
text: Target a unit at maximum range, and in in a straight line.

name: Suppress
text: An enemy hero in radius who is not adjacent to terrain discards a card, if able.

name: Assault Jump
text: Place yourself into a space in a straight line in radius. Push an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

name: Prepared Shot
text: Target a unit in range, in a straight line, and not adjacent to you.

name: Pin Down
text: An enemy hero in radius who is not adjacent to terrain discards a card, if able.

name: Delayed Jump
text: **End of turn:** Place yourself into a space in radius not in a straight line from you.

name: Shotgun
text:
Target a unit in range. Before the attack:
An enemy hero adjacent to the target discards a card, if able.

name: Mark for Death
text:
Move an enemy minion in radius up to 3 spaces to a space in radius.
**Next turn:** The first time an enemy minion in radius is defeated, gain 1 coin.

name: Drop Trooper
text: Place yourself into a space in a straight line in radius. Push up to two enemy units adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

name: Killshot
text: Target a unit in range, in a straight line, and not adjacent to you.

name: Killing Ground
text: An enemy hero in radius who is not adjacent to terrain discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Mobile Scout
text:
**End of turn:** Place yourself into a space in radius not in a straight line from you.
You may then fast travel, if able.

name: Super-Shotgun
text:
Target a unit in range. Before the attack:
An enemy hero adjacent to the target discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Hunting Season
text:
Move up to two enemy minions in radius, up to 3 spaces each, to spaces in radius.
**Next turn:** The first two times an enemy minion in radius is defeated, gain 1 coin.
